abstract: While Apple and its suppliers are celebrating the success of the iPad, many other companies will suffer.
snippet: While Apple and its suppliers are celebrating the success of the iPad, many other companies will suffer.
lead_paragraph: Apple sold 3.3 million iPads last quarter. That is one of the best starts ever for a consumer electronic device. It could sell 25 million of the electronic tablets next year, based on the trajectory of past consumer hits.

headline.main: As iPad Gains, Others Will Lose
headline.print_headline: As iPad Gains, Others Will Lose
